org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin7

Annotation Type FieldBuilder.ComboBox


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Documented
public static @interface FieldBuilder.ComboBox
    Specifies how a Java property should be edited in Vaadin using an ComboBox.
    See Also:
    FieldBuilder.AbstractField, FieldBuilder.AbstractSelect, FieldBuilder

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      FilteringMode filteringMode
      Get the filtering mode.
      String inputPrompt
      Get the input prompt.
      int pageLength
      Get the page length.
      boolean scrollToSelectedItem
      Get whether to scroll to the selected item.
      boolean textInputAllowed
      Get whether text input is allowed.
      Class<? extends ComboBox> type
      Get the ComboBox type that will edit the property.

    • Element Detail

      • type

        public abstract Class<? extends ComboBox> type
        Get the ComboBox type that will edit the property. Type must have a no-arg constructor.
        Returns:
        field type
        Default:
        com.vaadin.ui.ComboBox.class

      • inputPrompt

        public abstract String inputPrompt
        Get the input prompt.
        Returns:
        input prompt
        See Also:
        ComboBox.setInputPrompt(java.lang.String)
        Default:
        ""

      • pageLength

        public abstract int pageLength
        Get the page length.
        Returns:
        page length, or -1 for none
        See Also:
        ComboBox.setPageLength(int)
        Default:
        -1

      • scrollToSelectedItem

        public abstract boolean scrollToSelectedItem
        Get whether to scroll to the selected item.
        Returns:
        true to scroll to the selected item
        See Also:
        ComboBox.setScrollToSelectedItem(boolean)
        Default:
        true

      • textInputAllowed

        public abstract boolean textInputAllowed
        Get whether text input is allowed.
        Returns:
        true to allow text input
        See Also:
        ComboBox.setTextInputAllowed(boolean)
        Default:
        true

      • filteringMode

        public abstract FilteringMode filteringMode
        Get the filtering mode.
        Returns:
        filtering mode
        See Also:
        ComboBox.setFilteringMode(com.vaadin.shared.ui.combobox.FilteringMode)
        Default:
        com.vaadin.shared.ui.combobox.FilteringMode.STARTSWITH
